world

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.Wall

  • public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
    A wall in the map that contains a list of vertices in clockwise order. Entities can't pass through walls, but can be on the wall borders.
    Author:
    Mathieu Plourde - mat.plourde@gmail.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wall(Point[] vertices) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point[] getVertices()
      Returns the list of vertices in clockwise order.
      boolean isPointInWall(double x, double y)
      Returns whether p(x, y) is inside the wall or not.
      boolean isPointInWall(Point point)
      Returns whether the point is inside the wall or not.

    • Method Detail

      • isPointInWall

        public boolean isPointInWall(Point point)
        Returns whether the point is inside the wall or not. The point has to be inside the wall and not on the border.
